title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 23 April 2014 - XWiki
content:
<OSIMasson> has quit  
01:11 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki  
01:34 <OSIMasson> has quit  
01:38 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki  
01:59 <OSIMasson> has quit  
03:20 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki  
04:24 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
04:26 <OSIMasson> has quit  
04:48 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
06:01 <Denis1> has joined #xwiki  
06:03 <Denis> has quit  
08:09 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
08:22 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
08:44 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
08:50 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
09:17 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:20 <msmeria> tmortagne: good morning  
09:20 <msmeria> I was testing XWIKI-10201 and now the download isn't stuck, but the file I download is empty (0kb)  
09:21 <msmeria> I'm on 6.0rc1  
09:22 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
09:23 <Denis1> is now known as <Denis>  
09:30 <tmortagne> msmeria: you mean XWIKI-10240 ?  
09:32 <msmeria> tmortagne: yes, I'm on jetty  
09:32 <msmeria> so the issue is fixed (the download is not stuck), it's just that I get an empty target file  
09:33 <msmeria> if I type in a target name I get a valid XAR  
09:33 <tmortagne> msmeria: did you tried with tomcat ?  
09:33 <tmortagne> downloading 6.0RC1  
09:33 <msmeria> no I didn't  
09:34 <msmeria> testing now on tomcat  
09:40 <tmortagne> msmeria: actually i'm suprised to were able to install confluence wikistream module, looks like we have an issue with several version of guava listed in core extensions  
09:40 <tmortagne> could you go to core extension in admin  
09:40 <tmortagne> and search for guava  
09:41 <tmortagne> and tell me what you got  
09:41 <tmortagne> searching what is embedding guava like this  
09:42 <tmortagne> crap it's jython  
09:42 <msmeria> tmortagne: Guava: Google Core Libraries for Java         16.0.1  
09:43 <tmortagne> yep it's probably random which one is found first  
09:43 <tmortagne> I will need to create a custom jython jar  
09:53 <msmeria> tmortagne: I reproduced the issue on Tomcat too on FF & Chrome  
09:54 <msmeria> aside from the fact that Tomcat is soooooo much slower than Jetty...  
09:54 <tmortagne> msmeria: tomcat with hsqldb ?  
09:54 <msmeria> yes  
09:54 <tmortagne> that's weird  
09:54 <tmortagne> I don't see why tomcat would be so slow  
09:54 <msmeria> I don't know either  
09:55 <msmeria> I remember it worked fine last time I used it  
09:56 <msmeria> tmortagne: does this say anything to you ?  
09:56 <msmeria> INFO: validateJarFile(D:\xwiki\apache-tomcat-7.0.53\webapps\xwiki\WEB-INF\lib\javax.servlet-3.0.0.v201112011016.jar) - jar not loaded. See Servlet Spec 3.0, section 10.7.2. Offending class: javax/servlet/Servlet.class  
09:57 <tmortagne> nop  
09:57 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
09:57 <tmortagne> but it's a INFO so I guess it's not a big deal  
09:57 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:58 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
10:00 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:01 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
10:04 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
10:20 <sbaloul> has joined #xwiki  
10:48 <tmortagne> msmeria: I can't reproduce on master but I have the same issue as you on 6.0RC1 jetty/hsqldb distribution, I will have to debug this one directly  
10:51 <msmeria> tmortagne: ok  
11:46 <Kaisen> has joined #xwiki  
12:00 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
12:00 <vmassol> hmmm  
12:00 <vmassol> actually I might have broken our build with my last commits  
12:00 <vmassol> ah no it's ok since we're not on windows  
12:02 <vmassol> but I've probably broken the tests on windows since in enterprise's test pom.xml we have:  
12:02 <vmassol>         <xwikiExecutionStartCommand>cmd /c start\_xwiki.bat ${port} ${stopport}</xwikiExecutionStartCommand>  
12:23 <vmassol1> has joined #xwiki  
12:25 <mflorea> has quit  
12:26 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
12:34 <ClemensR> the test WatchlistMacroTest.testWatchAndRemoveEntries   is flapping ... I can even vaguely guess why, but have no good idea how to fix it (yet)
